name: Spaceman Dave
description:
Strap your jetpack on and blast into outer space, 1980s style in this addictive shoot em up!

Enjoy all the great gameplay elements from your favourite retro classics like Defender, Lunar Rescue, Scramble, Galaga with a bit of Llamasoft weirdness thrown in.

Pixel-tastic fun that will float your boat if you love retro gaming!
